Uses of Package
squidpony.squidai.astar

Packages that use squidpony.squidai.astar 
Package Description
squidpony.squidai.astar  
squidpony.squidmath
A very broad package containing random number generators, geometry tools, and some classes for combinatorics.
  • Classes in squidpony.squidai.astar used by squidpony.squidai.astar 
    Class Description
    Connection
    A connection between two nodes of the Graph.
    Graph
    A graph is a collection of nodes, each one having a collection of outgoing connections.
    Heuristic
    A Heuristic generates estimates of the cost to move from a given node to the goal.
    Pathfinder
    An indexed A* pathfinder that works with a Graph of nodes (generic type N).
    Pathfinder.Metrics
    A class used by Pathfinder to collect search metrics.
  • Classes in squidpony.squidai.astar used by squidpony.squidmath 
    Class Description
    DefaultGraph
    A convenient implementation of Graph for Coord nodes; this also allows constructing a Graph with a 2D char array like those produced all over SquidLib.
    Pathfinder
    An indexed A* pathfinder that works with a Graph of nodes (generic type N).
